{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3659776,"name":"Austin Yu","username":"Justmore5mins","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/278dde/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-06-22T03:15:36.313Z","cooked":"

Hi CD, I am the leader programmer from FRC8569, Taiwan.

We just purchased the CTRE Phoenix Pro license, and wanted to apply to our chassis.
We’re using the Swerve Project Generator generated chassis, and how can i use the extra libraries and profiling the PID coefficients?

I know that ClosedLoopOutputType.TorqueCurrentFOC is available, is it only for steering or also driving?

(English is not my first language so if there’s anything wrong please tell me thank you)
